name: Spixel (MicrobyteArts)
description:
Spixel is a 2D indie game. The game is about using a spaceship to fight aliens - but here's the catch, you cannot move up or down and you need to dodge tons of meteorites. The game will be updated. This game also has a storyline but it has not been merged into the game. It is a separate button (sorry for that, should be updated).

Credits to the entire Microbyte Arts team working on this.
